name: Yum Yum! Dating Show
description:
The Yum Yum! Dating Show, the greatest dating show in the land!

Featuring 6 potential partners, True Love awaits! But who will win your heart?

As a contestant on the show, you must first ask the boys a question - then, depending on their answers, eliminate them one-by-one from the competition!

The boys are whittled down until there's only 1 remaining - who you can then enjoy spending the rest of your life with!

(No refunds. Choose at your own risk. We will not be held responsible for any tragic events that occur from dating these boys. Please date responsibly.)

A send-up of dating shows and anime tropes, about 20 minutes per playthrough. Multiple choices - ooh! But only 1 true ending!

May contain a rude word or two, and a lot of innuendo. But apart from that it's innocent enough!

Note: The game ends with an Oscar-winning performance by the self_voicing robot. Windows and Mac players should hear this automatically, but Linux players may need to install the 'espeak' command on their system before playing!

Special thanks to Creative Commons resources: Godline for the original idea and script, Konett for 5 sprites, other sprites by: Anne, fuicchi, doot, MelodyL and Zylinder. A drumroll by heigh-hoo. Music by Josh Woodward and AlcaKnight. Made in Ren'Py

Note for Let's Players/Streamers: Contains music by Josh Woodward which will probably flag Youtube's content_ID program. Follow this link to see how to provide attribution: https://www.joshwoodward.com/sharing/ Specific song titles used are in CREDITS.txt, provided in the game's folder.

One last thing: You can now play on Android, thanks to Godline! Link to Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=yyds.vn
